title: The Grand Budapest Hotel: Slate's Spoiler Special
description:
Slate's Dana Stevens, Forrest Wickman, David Haglund and Chris Wade discuss The Grand Budapest Hotel.  WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've seen the movie.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
